system.weapons:
Turret: Inferno Cannon (50m, S/-/-, 2d10+15 E, Pen 8, Clip 100, Reload -, Flame Spray)

Hull, one of: Front Facing Heavy Bolter or Heavy Flamer

Pintle (Optional), one of: Heavy Stubber or Storm Bolter

---

Heavy Bolter (150m, -/-/6, 1d10+8 X, Pen 5, Clip 60, Rld Full, Tearing)

Heavy Flamer (30m, S/-/-, 1d10+5 E, Pen 4, Clip 20, Rld 2 Full, Flame, Spray)

Heavy Stubber(100m, -/-/8, 1d10+4 I, Pen 3, Clip 80, Rld 2 Full)

Storm Bolter(90m, S/2/4, 1d10+4, Pen 4, Clip 60, Rld Full, Storm, Tearing)
system.specialRules:
Vehicle Traits: Enclosed, Enhanced Motive Systems, Extremely Volatile, Reinforced Armour, Tracked Vehicle.

Moves Twice Tactical Speed as Half Action, +10 to Floor it! Action. Halve Critical rolls not generated from Righteous Fury, Double Chance of explosion if catching on fire. +10 to difficult terrain.

Special Rules: Large Promethium Reserves double the Inferno Cannon's Ammo Supply (already inclued in profile). If it runs out, Vehicle Loses Extremely Volatile Trait, reloading is done externally and takes a while.
